colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (CES GTOR MA BRGYA RTZA SHIN TU BSDUS PA BDUD RTZI'I SNYING PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG, SPYIR BRGYA RTZA'I RIM PA RGYAS BSDUS SKABS SU GANG BABS RANG GI 'DOD PA DANG SBYAR CHOG PA, RGYAL DBANG LNGA PA CHEN PO DANG, PAn CHEN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO SOGS @006A *, ,KYIS MDZAD PA RANG PHYOGS 'DIR SHIN TU MANG BAR 'DUG PA'I 'DI RIGS BRIS PA'I DAL BA MI DGOS RUNG, RANG GI NYE 'KHOR DAD BRTZON RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA MDZOD PA YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN NAS, DER GYI NGAG BRTZOM 'DI LTA BU ZHIG CIS KYANG BRIS DGOS ZHES NAN GYIS BSKUL NGOR, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG CHOS KYI DBANG PHYUG TU 'BOD PA'I GYI NA BA ZHIG GIS THUN MTSAMS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA 'DIS KYANG 'GRO BA KUN LA PHAN PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
